        public List()

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public int add(String listName,
               Boolean createEmptyList,
               Boolean allowUnsubscribe,
               String rule,
               ApiTypes.StringArray emails,
               Boolean allContacts)
        throws Exception
        Create new list, based on filtering rule or list of IDs
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        listName - Name of your list.
        createEmptyList - True to create an empty list, otherwise false. Ignores rule and emails parameters if provided.
        allowUnsubscribe - True: Allow unsubscribing from this list. Otherwise, false
        rule - Query used for filtering.
        emails - Comma delimited list of contact emails
        allContacts - True: Include every Contact in your Account. Otherwise, false
        Returns:
        int
        Throws:
        Exception

      • addContacts

        public void addContacts(String listName,
                        String rule,
                        ApiTypes.StringArray emails,
                        Boolean allContacts)
                 throws Exception
        Add existing Contacts to chosen list
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        listName - Name of your list.
        rule - Query used for filtering.
        emails - Comma delimited list of contact emails
        allContacts - True: Include every Contact in your Account. Otherwise, false
        Throws:
        Exception

      • copy

        public int copy(String sourceListName,
                String newlistName,
                Boolean createEmptyList,
                Boolean allowUnsubscribe,
                String rule)
         throws Exception
        Copy your existing List with the option to provide new settings to it. Some fields, when left empty, default to the source list's settings
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        sourceListName - The name of the list you want to copy
        newlistName - Name of your list if you want to change it.
        createEmptyList - True to create an empty list, otherwise false. Ignores rule and emails parameters if provided.
        allowUnsubscribe - True: Allow unsubscribing from this list. Otherwise, false
        rule - Query used for filtering.
        Returns:
        int
        Throws:
        Exception

      • createFromCampaign

        public int createFromCampaign(int campaignID,
                              String listName,
                              ApiTypes.LogJobStatusArray statuses)
                       throws Exception
        Create a new list from the recipients of the given campaign, using the given statuses of Messages
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        campaignID - ID of the campaign which recipients you want to copy
        listName - Name of your list.
        statuses - Statuses of a campaign's emails you want to include in the new list (but NOT the contacts' statuses)
        Returns:
        int
        Throws:
        Exception

      • createNthSelectionLists

        public void createNthSelectionLists(String listName,
                                    int numberOfLists,
                                    Boolean excludeBlocked,
                                    Boolean allowUnsubscribe,
                                    String rule,
                                    Boolean allContacts)
                             throws Exception
        Create a series of nth selection lists from an existing list or segment
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        listName - Name of your list.
        numberOfLists - The number of evenly distributed lists to create.
        excludeBlocked - True if you want to exclude contacts that are currently in a blocked status of either unsubscribe, complaint or bounce. Otherwise, false.
        allowUnsubscribe - True: Allow unsubscribing from this list. Otherwise, false
        rule - Query used for filtering.
        allContacts - True: Include every Contact in your Account. Otherwise, false
        Throws:
        Exception

      • createRandomList

        public int createRandomList(String listName,
                            int count,
                            Boolean excludeBlocked,
                            Boolean allowUnsubscribe,
                            String rule,
                            Boolean allContacts)
                     throws Exception
        Create a new list with randomized contacts from an existing list or segment
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        listName - Name of your list.
        count - Number of items.
        excludeBlocked - True if you want to exclude contacts that are currently in a blocked status of either unsubscribe, complaint or bounce. Otherwise, false.
        allowUnsubscribe - True: Allow unsubscribing from this list. Otherwise, false
        rule - Query used for filtering.
        allContacts - True: Include every Contact in your Account. Otherwise, false
        Returns:
        int
        Throws:
        Exception

      • delete

        public void delete(String listName)
            throws Exception
        Deletes List and removes all the Contacts from it (does not delete Contacts).
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        listName - Name of your list.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • export

        public ApiTypes.ExportLink export(String listName,
                                  ApiTypes.ExportFileFormats fileFormat,
                                  ApiTypes.CompressionFormat compressionFormat,
                                  String fileName)
                           throws Exception
        Exports all the contacts from the provided list
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        listName - Name of your list.
        fileFormat - Format of the exported file
        compressionFormat - FileResponse compression format. None or Zip.
        fileName - Name of your file.
        Returns:
        ApiTypes.ExportLink
        Throws:
        Exception

      • list

        public ApiTypes.ListArray list(Date from,
                               Date to)
                        throws Exception
        Shows all your existing lists
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        from - Starting date for search in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss format.
        to - Ending date for search in YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss format.
        Returns:
        ApiTypes.ListArray
        Throws:
        Exception

      • load

        public ApiTypes.List load(String listName)
                   throws Exception
        Returns detailed information about specific list.
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        listName - Name of your list.
        Returns:
        ApiTypes.List
        Throws:
        Exception

      • moveContacts

        public void moveContacts(String oldListName,
                         String newListName,
                         ApiTypes.StringArray emails,
                         Boolean moveAll,
                         ApiTypes.ContactStatusArray statuses,
                         String rule)
                  throws Exception
        Move selected contacts from one List to another
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        oldListName - The name of the list from which the contacts will be copied from
        newListName - The name of the list to copy the contacts to
        emails - Comma delimited list of contact emails
        moveAll - TRUE - moves all contacts; FALSE - moves contacts provided in the 'emails' parameter. This is ignored if the 'statuses' parameter has been provided
        statuses - List of contact statuses which are eligible to move. This ignores the 'moveAll' parameter
        rule - Query used for filtering.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • removeContacts

        public void removeContacts(String listName,
                           String rule,
                           ApiTypes.StringArray emails)
                    throws Exception
        Remove selected Contacts from your list
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        listName - Name of your list.
        rule - Query used for filtering.
        emails - Comma delimited list of contact emails
        Throws:
        Exception

      • update

        public void update(String listName,
                   String newListName,
                   Boolean allowUnsubscribe)
            throws Exception
        Update existing list
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        listName - Name of your list.
        newListName - Name of your list if you want to change it.
        allowUnsubscribe - True: Allow unsubscribing from this list. Otherwise, false
        Throws:
        Exception
